mapper.select:
select t.XFZL_ID as xfzlId,t.BT as bt, t.NR as nr,t.LX as lx,t.ZT as zt,t.LLCS as llcs,t.DZCS as dzcs,t.FBSJ as fbsj, t.cdate as cdate, u.username as cpersonUserName, t.order_num as orderNum from xfzl t left join sys_user u on t.cperson = u.username where 1=1 and (t.BT LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{params.gjc},'%') or t.NR LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{params.gjc},'%'))
and t.LX = #{params.lx}
and DATEDIFF(t.FBSJ, NOW())>=-1
and DATEDIFF(t.FBSJ, NOW())>=-3
and DATEDIFF(t.FBSJ, NOW())>=-7
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.FBSJ, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
order by t.order_num desc, t.LLCS+t.DZCS desc
mapper.update: update xfzl set LLCS=LLCS+1 where XFZL_ID=#{value}
update xfzl set DZCS=DZCS+1 where XFZL_ID=#{value}
update xfzl set DZ_USER_IDS=#{dzUserIds} where XFZL_ID=#{xfzlId}
mapper.delete:

#{xfzlId}
